item.title: I have a small problem that i dont know how to fix
item.dc:creator: @real897j real897j
item.description:
@real897j wrote:

when i run my compiler i get this message

client.java:133: illegal start of expression
public boolean DCDamg = false;
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

here is the area that the error accured

SpecDamg(25);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;

}

public boolean DCDamg = false; <----this is the line 133
public int DCdown = 0;
public static WorldMap WorldMap = null;
public boolean isBK = false;
public boolean isBT = false;

Any help would be much appriciated
Thanks for your Time
